bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with li jie feng 歷節風 , pervading joints wind. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry bai shi zi 白師子：主白虎病，向東人呼為歷節風 , “It controls the white tiger disease . The people towards the East call it ‘pervading joints wind’”. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 13: 其 疾晝靜而夜發，發即徹髓，酸疼乍歇，其病如虎之嚙，故名白虎之病也 , “This disease is dormant during daytime and breaks out during the night. When it breaks out it cuts through to the marrow. The pain stops at times. This disease feels like being bitten by a tiger. Hence it is called ‘ white tiger disease ’”.
